levelselect.newlevel: Come back tomorrow for a new board!
tutorial.page1:
Match the pairs of Mahjong pieces to score.
You can reach only pieces with at least one free side (left or right).
tutorial.page2: There are special Mahjong pieces. You can match any flower tile with any other flower tile, and any season tile with any season tile, however you can't match a flower tile with a season tile.
tutorial.page3:
Solve the level board before time runs out.
If you need some help, you can use hints.
gameplay.nomoves: There are no more available moves. Please wait.
pause.restartconfirmation: Sure you want to restart the level?
pause.exitconfirmation: Sure you want to quit the level?
loading.title: Loading
deluxe.title: Download the Deluxe Version
deluxe.mf1.title: MAHJONGG FORTUNA DELUXE
deluxe.mf1.subtitle: DELUXE VERSION
deluxe.mf1.feature1:
- Enjoy the challenging gameplay
- Choose from different settings and tile sets
- Play against the clock or strategically
deluxe.mf2.title: MAHJONG FORTUNA 2
deluxe.mf2.subtitle: DELUXE VERSION
deluxe.mf2.feature1:
- 3 game modes: Arcade, Classic and Fortuna
- Many different collections and backgrounds
- 96 levels
deluxe.hm.title: Hotel Mahjong
deluxe.hm.subtitle: DELUXE VERSION
deluxe.hm.feature1:
- 5 different mahjong games
- 20 floors with 5 rooms each
- 2 game modes: against the clock or without pressure
